title: U.S. consumer usage of mobile payments 2017
summary: This chart shows the Share of respondents made by Response in a mobile payments .
\\n From the chart we see that the Purchase_in-app_or_online Response was the U.S. consumer Response in the payments with 64 respondents .
The next Response to make the most respondents was the Received_loyalty_points Response with 26 respondents closely followed by the Sent_money_internationally Response with 2 respondents .
gold: This statistic gives information on the U.S. consumer usage of mobile payment offerings as of January 2017 . During a survey of smartphone owners , 49 percent of respondents stated they had paid a bill via mobile .
